p: As well known, there were plenty of environmental issues and public health issues for the abuse of pesticides. Traditional agrochemical had a great risk of pesticide/bacterial resistance, environmental pollution, and human health harm. According to Agrow’s report, the total output value of the world agrochemical market had reached USD $31–35 billion in 2007 [ 1]. Therefore, looking for biopesticide with high efficiency and low toxicity was important.
